name: Siege of Hearts
description:
Two Gnomish princesses bursting with love and only one prince. Who can win his affection? (Represented by sprite items)

For Unreal Winter Jam 2019, topic: "All's Fair in Love and War"

My first Unreal Engine 4 game, it was hard fought but I learned a lot! Requires two players and a game pad. May have some bugs since I am not very experienced with the engine yet.

Font credits: OwreKynge, alagard

Music credits: Kevin MacLeod - Reformat, Heroic Age (cropped)

I noticed there's a debug message left in and a wrong sprite used for one set of animations, but I don't know if we're allowed to reupload, so I guess it'll have to stay in for now!
